    <item> 
      <title>Crawford 'terrified' of West End return</title>  
      <description>Michael Crawford reveals the thought of his first West End appearance in five years later this month frightens him.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-36267290#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa</link>  
      <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-36267290</guid>  
      <pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 05:40:47 GMT</pubDate> 
    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Westlife star out of Eurovision final</title>  
      <description>Ireland has been knocked out of the 2016 Eurovision Song Contest after former Westlife singer Nicky Byrne fails to qualify.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-36283139#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa</link>  
      <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-36283139</guid>  
      <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 22:34:03 GMT</pubDate> 
    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Music News LIVE: 12 May</title>  
      <description>Rolling coverage of the biggest music news stories from around the world.</description>

    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>BBC must focus on 'distinctive content'</title>  
      <description>The BBC must put "distinctive content" at its heart, Culture Secretary John Whittingdale says, as he announces a major overhaul of how the corporation is run.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-36259237#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa</link>  
      <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-36259237</guid>  
      <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 16:09:43 GMT</pubDate> 
    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Sheridan Smith takes Funny Girl break</title>  
      <description>Sheridan Smith is to take time off from her role as Fanny Brice in the stage musical Funny Girl due to stress and exhaustion, the show's producers say.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-36277626#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa</link>  
      <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-36277626</guid>  
      <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 12:37:58 GMT</pubDate> 
    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>First Stone Roses single since 1995</title>  
      <description>Influential Manchester band The Stone Roses release their first new material since 1995, an upbeat psych-rock track called All For One.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-36275003#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa</link>  
      <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-36275003</guid>

      <media:thumbnail width="144" height="81" url="http://c.files.bbci.co.uk/16609/production/_89675619_e745945d-b4d8-41ef-a7e3-b5124f4efa99.jpg"/> 
    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Fetishist artist on Turner Prize shortlist</title>  
      <description>The four nominees for the annual Turner Prize are unveiled, including an artist specialising in sexual imagery and one who builds trains.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-36274589#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa</link>  
      <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-36274589</guid>  
      <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 10:41:33 GMT</pubDate> 
    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Black Eyed Peas reform at London show</title>  
      <description>The Black Eyed Peas have played together for the first time in five years at a free show in London's Royal Albert Hall, but singer Fergie did not attend.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-36274235#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa</link>  
      <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-36274235</guid>

    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Journalist Sally Brampton dies aged 60</title>  
      <description>The founding editor of Elle magazine in the UK, Sally Brampton, dies at the age of 60.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-36273894#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa</link>

    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Japanese enthusiast's $98m art spree</title>  
      <description>Japanese online retail billionaire Yusaku Maezawa spends $98m (Â£68m) at two auctions of contemporary art in New York,.</description>

    <item> 
      <title>SA radio introduces 90% local music quota</title>  
      <description>South Africa's national broadcaster introduces a quota system, requiring 90% of the music played across its radio stations to be homegrown.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-africa-36275487#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa</link>

    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Clarkson show named The Grand Tour</title>  
      <description>Former Top Gear hosts Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May's new show on Amazon's streaming video service will be called The Grand Tour.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-36267294#sa-ns_mchannel=rss&ns_source=PublicRSS20-sa</link>

      <title>Ukraine recovers stolen masterpieces</title>  
      <description>Ukraine says it has recovered 17 paintings - including works by Tintoretto and Rubens - stolen from an Italian museum and worth more than â¬16m (Â£13m; $18m).</description>
